messages.title: Seeking Your Support for Stuart Andrew
messages.content: The choice in this election is straight-forward, but that choice could not be more important. On 9 June, we will wake up to one of two people as Prime Minister - Theresa May or Jeremy Corbyn. Theresa May will provide the country with strong and stable leadership as we negotiate the terms of our exit from the EU, but Jeremy Corbyn will be presiding over a coalition between Labour, the Greens, Liberals and the SNP - we won't even be able to agree the priorities amongst themselves, and the country will be in chaos as this coalition progresses. A vote for me on 8 June is a vote for stability, and strong government with Theresa May. I hope that I can count on your support.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stuart secured £173m for transport projects in Leeds - which will be essential for the success of our city.
Stuart Andrew has been a very strong voice supporting residents to oppose Labour's plans to build on our greenbelt.
A strong economy is essential for jobs and prosperity.

endorsements.endorsement: Stuart secured £173m for transport projects in Leeds - which will be essential for the success of our city. Stuart really cares about our community, and has worked hard for it for many years.
Stuart Andrew has been a very strong voice supporting residents to oppose Labour's plans to build on our greenbelt. He's certainly got my vote.
As a young person at the start of my career, I know that a strong economy is essential for jobs and prosperity. I also know that only a Conservative government can provide this.
